text: Why have you come to me?
Will you come along with me?"
Why have you come to me?
Will you come along with me?"
You make my eyes go twinkle twinkle
My inside is throbbing, I'm yearning
When you call me, you leave me electrified
I'll wait till it strikes twelve in the midnight
Ding dong ding I will ring your bell
Open the door and stand next to me
Tell me everything right into my ears
Why have you come to me?
Will you come along with me?"
Why have you come to me?
Will you come along with me?"
Tick tock! It strikes 12, I jump the wall and climb the stairs
Ding dong! I ring the bell, as chills go down my spine
Sarala's daughter comes, from behind the door,
She gazes at me and asks
"Oh my dear! Why are your eyes red?
Why are your lips so pale ?
Why are you sweating all over?"
“Oh darling, I've got butterflies in my stomach ! “
What is this? What is this ?"
"There's a bite mark on your neck!"
My fangs & nails are popping out !
My fangs & nails are popping out !
In my mind, there's fire fire
Come close to me, my dear dear
I'm hungry, my appetite is higher higher
I'm the yakshi (ghost) that bit you!"
Plots twist, out of the blue
Change in fate, change in pace
Head to toe, I'm totally screwed !
"Now it's time for the thrill, boy!
Come with me to hell, boy!
Once we’re there, we’ll Netflix and Chill, boy!"
Yo! Chilling with Yakshi for real
Yo! Chilling with Yakshi for real
Goblins and phantoms so high that
They chasing each other for nothing!
The only time I've seen so many ghosts together
Was in kadamattom kathanar’s title song !
Is this real ? Or is this fantasy?
You ? What are you doing at my house ?
